item.title: Lintâ€™s STOPSHIP can save you from pushing your buggy code to production
item.author: iamnaveentp@gmail.com (Naveen T P)
item.description: Photo by Kristaps Grundsteins on Unsplash Have you anytime come across the situation where you published your app to playstore and recalling the bug that you left unfixed? If yes, then this article is for you. Android Lint is one of the most important and powerful static analysis tool that we are not using to its fullest. We can customise lint in our build.gradle to avoid accidentally pushing the known bugs to production.
